caption.center: STATE v. Joseph G. NEVINS, Jr.

opinion.attorneys:
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Faith A. LaSalle, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Dean J. Lewis, Newport, for defendant.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER [2] The defendant's motion for bail pending appeal pursuant to Supreme Court Rule 9 is denied.
[3] DORIS, J., did not participate.
